name: Paper Plane Rush - VR Edition
description:
Paper Plane Rush is a simple arcade solo-racing game. Fly as fast as possible through the environment, collect speed bonuses and use your piloting skills to not end up into a wall.

To make things worse, the local inhabitants might be unhappy with your intrusion and might actively try to turn your origami aircraft into confetti.

Designed for :
  • Keyboard
  • XBox 360 Gamepad
  • Standard Screen
  • Oculus Rift
